Plot: In the midst of the Hundred Years' War in 1415, the young King Henry V of England embarks on the conquest of France.
Title: Henry V
Writer: William Shakespeare (by), Kenneth Branagh (adapted for the screen by)
Actors: Derek Jacobi, Kenneth Branagh, Simon Shepherd, James Larkin
tomatoConsensus: Pehaps Kenneth Branagh's most fully realized Shakespeare adaptation, Henry V is an energetic, passionate, and wonderfully acted film.
